name: LD48 - Kibble Caper
description:
The Rat Gang's evil boss has gone too far this time and stolen all of your kibble! Track him down and defeat him in this cute and clumsy Ape Escape-like!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/ld48-kibble-caper

Move: WASD

Attack: Hold and Release Mouse  1 

Rotate Camera:  Mouse 

Game by Seth Mussmann https://twitter.com/TehSetha

Original Music by Taylor Cook Bandcamp

Thank you for playing!
